entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets or freezing rain near midnight then to rain or drizzle overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8 except minus 14 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8 except minus 14 inland. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023
